creator: ashok_r2000@hotmail.com
text:
Hi 

We are using the JINDI Relam to look for the users when they login. We have noticed that everytime the user Logins for the first time the login fails. Immediately if the user login again the same user is authenticated,

Thanks
Ashok

creator: markt@apache.org
text:
There have been many fixes to the JNDI realm since 4.1.18 including, I believe, this one. I suggest you upgrade to the latest stable 4.1.x release.

If possible, you should move to 5.5.x or 6.0.x as 4.1.x is unlikely to see a release, even for a security issue, after June 2009.

creator: markt@apache.org
text: This has been fixed. Please don't change the resolution without good reason.
